name: TriterraPower
0:
”Alexa, ask TriTerra to turn on”
”Alexa, ask TriTerra to turn off”
”Alexa, ask TriTerra to turn on my power bank”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
TriTerra Technology manufacturing intelligent power bank. You can control Triterra Power device with this Alexa Skill. You can control the socket of the bank. You can also configure a routine to control your device automatically.
Download the TriTerra Power app on Android or iOS so that you can log in to this app using the account you created in TriTerra Power app.
